name: Little Timmy and the Flight of the Pus Fairy
name_original: Little Timmy and the Flight of the Pus Fairy
description: Z Games is a tiny independent game studio that was founded in September 2005.  In our first 15 months, we created and released the first 23 entries in the Z Mini Games series, which received over 70,000 cumulative downloads via Download.com.  Just about 16 years later, we decided it was time to resurrect Z Games and continue making PC games for humans.  All of our Z Mini Games were previously compiled into a package called Z Mini Games PURGAMENTUM, which we are currently updating for re-release on Itch.io... soon.
